metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30789 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A crafted NTFS image can cause a heap-based buffer overflow in ntfs_check_log_client_array in NTFS-3G through 2021.8.22.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-30789` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ntfs-3g - 1:2015.3.14AR.1-1ubuntu0.3+esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ntfs-3g package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2015.3.14AR.1-1ubuntu0.3+esm3').
